typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		ReturnDate as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		RentalCost as double,
		LateFee as double,
		RewindFlag as boolean,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FourthCoffeeSourceFiles
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		ReturnDate as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		RentalCost as double,
		LateFee as double,
		RewindFlag as boolean,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VanArsdaleSourceFiles
FourthCoffeeSourceFiles derive(SourceSystemNm = "FourthCoffee") ~> FourthCoffeeDerivedColumns
RenameTimestampColumns derive(SourceSystemNm = "VanArsdale",
		CreatedDate = toDate(toString(CreatedDateTS, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SS'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		UpdatedDate = toDate(toString(UpdatedDateTS, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SS'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> VanArsdaleDerivedColumns
FourthCoffeeDerivedColumns, VanArsdaleDerivedColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionFourthCoffeeAndVanArsdaleTxn
VanArsdaleSourceFiles select(mapColumn(
		TransactionID,
		CustomerID,
		MovieID,
		RentalDate,
		ReturnDate,
		RentalCost,
		LateFee,
		RewindFlag,
		CreatedDateTS = CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDateTS = UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameTimestampColumns
